thread.title: Nice boutique hotel near Champs Elysées
thread.title_full: Nice boutique hotel near Champs Elysées - Review of InterContinental Paris-Avenue Marceau, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: EB1433
title: Nice boutique hotel near Champs Elysées
text:
This is a small 5-star boutique hotel. Its location is very close to Champs Elysées but quiet. We booked 3 rooms, some were more spacious than others. Service was good. breakfast was also good. The staff are nice and friendly.
Room Tip: Room 111 was nice. See more room tips
